QuestData.Title: Stick in the Mud
QuestData.Description: I came out for a beautiful day of fishin', but I didn't think to bring a pole. There are so many things to remember for fishin', I just can't keep it all in my head.$B$BThose reeds along the river look alright for makin' a pole out of. If you'd gather me some number of them, I'd be willin' to think on you favorably when it comes time to price my merchandise. Oh, and I'll pay you too, of course. $B$BHow's that sound?
